title: ScratchPad 1.3 Released!
excerpt: ScratchPad 1.3 has been released! Included in the new version: [Feature] Ability to make the main window transparent. [Feature] Ability to float the main window above all other windows. [Feature] Users can now automatically create backup directories of their pages and preferences. [Feature] Backups can be re-imported into ScratchPad. You can download either by selecting … more →
